History
-------

"14.11" (2014-01-11)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.


"15.5.2" (2015-05-02)
---------------------

* Polyglot is feature complete.


"15.10.03" (2015-10-03)
---------------------------

* Change the polyglot models mirror to Stony Brook University DSL lab instead
  of Google cloud storage.
